text:
─Phew.
Maybe I'll take a little break.

...Speaking of which,
about that tag Amana used...

[I decided to mimic everyone from ALSTROEMERIA 
and try posting something myself.]

[Today, I left my phone at the restaurant,
but the staff ran to return it to me.]
[Grateful for the kindness of the staff!]

[Today, I forgot my English textbook,
but the person next to me showed me theirs, so I was saved.]

[Kindness Awareness Month],
a lot of people are using it!

It seems to be spreading from ALSTROEMERIA's fans,
and even people other than them are starting to use it.
